Pushup: Get down on all wider than your shoulders. Lower and raise your body up 
 
Lunges: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart. Take a big step forward with right leg. Start to shift your weight forward so heel hits the floor first. 
 
 Burpee: Start in a push up Position. Jump up with your body and do a jumping jack 
 
Crunches: Lie down on your back. Plant your feet on the floor, hip-width apart. Bend your knees and place your arms across your chest. Contract your abs and inhale. 
 
 Squats: Stand with feet hip-width apart, holding dumbbells at shoulders, with abs tight. Send hips back and bend knees to lower until your thighs are perpindicular
